details.message_preview: You are participating in a multi-agent collaboration workflow. Use the context packet below as the source of truth for capabilities, tools, and current state. Decide your own approach for this step; do not call other agents directly. If another agent is needed, emit a need request. Either of these formats is accepted: - JSON: {"needs": [{"target": "AgentName", "request": "..."}]} - Text: [AgentName] concrete request Provide handoff-ready output for this step. Workflow Context Packet: { "workflow": { "workflow_id": "093f70836de243729a0e6578d44b5fcf-0fff8ccd", "current_step": 2, "total_steps_hint": 2, "assigned_agent": "MainAgent" }, "task": { "goal": "Post the SNS summary provided by the SocialMediaAnalyst to the 'agentic' Slack channel.", "expected_deliverable": "Confirmation of the Slack message delivery with a timestamp or success message.", "tool_hints": [ "slack_post_message" ] }, "request": { "user_input": "그와 관련해서 사람들이 얘기한 sns 게시물 있으면 그것도 찾아서 올려줘", "conversation_history": "user: 오픈클로 보안 관련 최신 뉴스 찾아서 내용 정리하고 슬랙 agentic 채널에 올려줘\nassistant: === Plan ===\nThe user wants to find recent security-related news regarding \"OpenCLO,\" summarize the findings, and post that summary to th...(truncated)
